div.p: Now Accepting Application for the 2018-2019 school year!

strong.span: YWCP will remain closed until further notice.

h6.span: The NYS Education Department has extended the continuity of learning through our originally planned spring break. Therefore, we will continue to provide instruction and online learning during this time. Please make sure students are checking google classroom daily. As a reminder, all information related to online learning is posted on our website. We thank you for your continued patience and will update you as information becomes available.

em.strong: Please update your Contact info using the google survey (click here) in order to recieve the most up to date information during this period of closure. We are also using the Remind App (available for ios & android) as a method of Parent Communication. If interested please follow these instructions to get set up.

Online Educational Resources are available for independent work. If parents would like tips for supporting their child’s online learning click here for our guide. All students should check their google classroom for classwork. (Click Here)
Meals for children will be available by home school district. (Click Here)
For help getting access to at home/hotspot internet service , please (Click here).

div.h6: We will continue to update community resources and information on our website. Our news section can be found at the bottom of this page. We will continue to post updates and school plans as they become available. We thank you for your continued patience as we work through this together.

div.p: YWCP believes in educating the whole girl and meeting the individual’s needs.
Stay up to date with school activities, foundation programs and events, and athletics.
YWCP continuously accepts applications for all grade levels. Apply today!
Read about all of the exciting things happening at YWCP!

div.h2:
Transforming Lives through a
Whole-Girl Education

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1541614186506 vc_row-has-fill vc_video-bg-container

div.h4: YWCP is an affiliate of the Young Women's Leadership Network (YWLN), which supports five highly successful, single-gender secondary schools in New York City.
div.p: Young Women's College Prep Charter School of Rochester (YWCP) offers young women grades 7-12 from the city of Rochester the opportunity to learn in a single-gender environment, free from stereotypes, where a strong focus is placed on preparation for college enrollment and graduation.

YWCP partners with families and instills in each student a sense of community, responsibility and ethics. We support students in their endeavors to achieve excellence in and out of the classroom, helping them to develop the strong voices they will need to be leaders.
4 Advanced Placement Classes offered
83 Students enrolled in at least one AP class in 2017-2018
12 College visits by each student throughout her 6 yrs
100% of students receive their own chromebook

div.h2:
100% College Acceptance
Two Year Schools
Four Year Public Schools
Four Year Private Schools
Service

div.p: YWCP Modified Basketball Team earns their 2nd win of the season in a close game vs. Finney!

p.a: Support Young Womens College Prep Charter School of Rochester by shopping at AmazonSmile.

div.p: Did you know that when you shop for the holidays at smile.amazon.com/ch/45-3436465, AmazonSmile donates to Young Women's College Prep Charter School of Rochester?
When you shop at AmazonSmile, Amazon will donate to Young Womens College Prep Charter School of Rochester. Support us every time you shop.

div.p: Young Women's College Prep Charter School of Rochester (YWCP) offers young women from the city of Rochester the opportunity to learn in a single-gender environment, free from stereotypes, where a strong focus is placed on preparation for college enrollment and graduation.
133 Hoover Drive Rochester, NY, 14615
School Phone Number: (585) 254-0320
Foundation Phone Number: (585) 445-3245

div.script: jQuery(document).ready(function() {var allowed_languages = ["ar","zh-CN","en","fr","de","it","pt","ru","es"];var accept_language = navigator.language.toLowerCase() || navigator.userLanguage.toLowerCase();switch(accept_language) {case 'zh-cn': var preferred_language = 'zh-CN'; break;case 'zh': var preferred_language = 'zh-CN'; break;case 'zh-tw': var preferred_language = 'zh-TW'; break;case 'zh-hk': var preferred_language = 'zh-TW'; break;default: var preferred_language = accept_language.substr(0, 2); break;}if(preferred_language != 'en' && GTranslateGetCurrentLang() == null && document.cookie.match('gt_auto_switch') == null && allowed_languages.indexOf(preferred_language) >= 0){doGTranslate('en|'+preferred_language);document.cookie = 'gt_auto_switch=1; expires=Thu, 05 Dec 2030 08:08:08 UTC; path=/;';var lang_html = jQuery('div.switcher div.option').find('img[alt="'+preferred_language+'"]').parent().html();if(typeof lang_html != 'undefined')jQuery('div.switcher div.selected a').html(lang_html.replace('data-gt-lazy-', ''));}});

body.script: /* */var tribe_l10n_datatables = {"aria":{"sort_ascending":": activate to sort column ascending","sort_descending":": activate to sort column descending"},"length_menu":"Show _MENU_ entries","empty_table":"No data available in table","info":"Showing _START_ to _END_ of _TOTAL_ entries","info_empty":"Showing 0 to 0 of 0 entries","info_filtered":"(filtered from _MAX_ total entries)","zero_records":"No matching records found","search":"Search:","all_selected_text":"All items on this page were selected. ","select_all_link":"Select all pages","clear_selection":"Clear Selection.","pagination":{"all":"All","next":"Next","previous":"Previous"},"select":{"rows":{"0":"","_":": Selected %d rows","1":": Selected 1 row"}},"datepicker":{"dayNames":["Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday"],"dayNamesShort":["Sun","Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat"],"dayNamesMin":["S","M","T","W","T","F","S"],"monthNames":["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"],"monthNamesShort":["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"],"monthNamesMin":["Jan","Feb","Mar","Apr","May","Jun","Jul","Aug","Sep","Oct","Nov","Dec"],"nextText":"Next","prevText":"Prev","currentText":"Today","closeText":"Done","today":"Today","clear":"Clear"}};/* */
